definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Everybody quickly went to the bomb shelter when the alert sounded.
sentences.chinese: 防空警報響起時，大家都快速進了防空洞。

sentences.english: Until recently, the construction of large bomb shelters was mainly the work of governments.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，建造大型防空洞才成爲政府的主要工作。

sentences.english: But in any case, the nuclear bunkers have dropped out of use.
sentences.chinese: 但是無論如何，核武防空洞已經退出使用。

sentences.english: We'd all be in shelters if we hadn't banded together.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們不團結起來的話，我們只能去住防空洞。

sentences.english: Hundreds of cellars and air-raid shelters are being rented out as living spaces in the Chinese capital.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，許多人租用地下室和防空洞作爲棲身之所。

sentences.english: The shield of family and friends can easily used as a shelter by criminals for further crimes.
sentences.chinese: 包庇窩贓，很容易成爲犯罪分子繼續作惡的防空洞。

sentences.english: They decided to turn their shelter into a storeroom.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定把防空洞改造成儲藏室。

sentences.english: One such tunnel served as an air raid shelter in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 有一條地下通道在二戰時期曾用來做爲防空洞。

sentences.english: It was certainly warmer in the dugouts.
sentences.chinese: 防空洞裏無疑要暖和多。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of using water-free toilet in the tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察免水衝生態廁所在防空洞中處理糞尿的效果。

sentences.english: They decided to turn the shelter into storeroom.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定把防空洞改造成儲藏室。

sentences.english: The Faro Caudill family eating dinner in their dugout.
sentences.chinese: 在法魯考迪爾在防空洞家庭喫晚餐。

sentences.english: They refers to the embrasures of the bomb shelters.
sentences.chinese: 它們同防空洞的射擊孔類似。

sentences.english: Let's go to the dug out . -Is it something special?
sentences.chinese: 讓我們去防空洞有特殊情況？

definition: pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]
defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
